property.name: problem.title
property.value: Removed Unsafe Functional Interfaces in Package com.liferay.portal.kernel.util

property.name: problem.summary
property.value: The com.liferay.portal.osgi.util.test.OSGiServiceUtil class was removed. Also, the following interfaces were removed from the com.liferay.portal.kernel.util package: UnsafeConsumer, UnsafeFunction, UnsafeRunnable.
